comment: The worst teacher ever!!! Clearly dislike guys in her class. And.. If you end up with a 79.9, you won't get a B!!!

Dr. Graham was the best professor I had at K.S.U.  She was organized and always prepared for class. The students who did not get good grades were typically those that did not do the work. If you kept up with the reading and asked for help when needed, you would be fine.  She was FANTASTIC.
Everything said here is true. Boring, emotionless, disdainful, bland.  Just weird.  Avoid.

this is not a nice woman.  She acts like she'd rather be anywhere but in class with you.  She knows the material, but she doesn't do anything to make it interesting or clearer to the students.  Shows no emotion or energy.  Yuck!
you could work your butt off on an assignment but split an infinitive and you're dead meat.  how ridiculous is that?  she's irritable, unhelpful, and hard to find if you need help.  avoid her.
I took her a few years ago, and I remember her class being a challenge.  She is very knowledgeable, but beware, she grades her essays hard with grammar.

Her lectures are really disorganized. And she expects you to write 40 pages while taking her tests. She rattles off during lectures so students dont know what to takes notes exactely. She is helpful but is also pickey when it comes to tests.
